channel.title: Maps on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Maps on Konigi

item.title: Bing Maps
Silverado Vineyards
item.description: Silverado Vineyards celebrates a new Flash website with an interactive vineyard map and gorgeous photo galleries on most wine, tours, and tasting pages to bring visitors to the heart of Sonoma County, online. http://www.silveradovineyards.com/vineyards/

item.title: hitotoki
item.description: Hitotoki is a literary project collecting stories tied to geographic locations. Nice hand drawn details and minimalist sensibility. Uses the connection to locales using Google Maps to navigate the story spaces on the home page. http://hitotoki.org/

item.title: Design Portfolios Using Google Maps UI
item.description: It appears there are quite a designers who are using the navigation tools for Google Maps to create pannable portfolios. Follow the links via Heavy Backpack and GoogleMapsMania. http://www.heavy-backpack.com/archives/articles/design-folios-with-google-maps

item.title: Free Vector World Maps Collection
item.description: If you're ever in need of a vector drawing of a world map, Web Resources Depot put together a list of links to maps you can find for free. Via swissmiss http://www.webresourcesdepot.com/free-vector-world-maps-collection/3
